---
id: get-program-mappings
title: "Program mappings"
description: "Retrieves mappings for a given program by Program ID. These mappings can then  be queried through additional endpoints."
sidebar_label: "Program mappings"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Program mappings"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/program/{programID}/mappings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves mappings for a given program by Program ID. These mappings can then  be queried through additional endpoints.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"programID","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
